messages.title: More steps to a fairer Britain
messages.content: Our record of action. Our promise of more.

messages.title: 3 Great reasons to vote for Paul Ray
messages.content: 1. Effective and experienced in helping small businesses start up. 2. Consistently against the Conservatives selling off our services. 3. Has lived locally all his life. He's one of us!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Create a million jobs, and stop penalising the jobless.
Increase spending on the NHS by £8b a year by 2020, and guarantee equal care for mental health.
Five new laws to protect nature, green spaces, and air and water quality.

issues.economy: Entrepreneurs backed by Liberal Democrats: - we’ve helped create 2 million apprenticeships - more than doubled the number of companies that offer apprenticeships.
issues.education: The manifesto commitment on education is to protect per pupil funding from nursery to 19.
issues.environment: Five new laws to protect nature, green spaces, and air and water quality.
issues.governance: Consistently against the Conservatives selling off our services.
issues.health: Increase spending on the NHS by £8b a year by 2020, and guarantee equal care for mental health.

leaflet.personalStatement: Paul will be a strong voice for us in Parliament. Independent-minded with a real passion to help people, and Paul has the commitment and experience to deliver.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet makes general campaign statements but does not provide detailed policies or references to specific local issues apart from the candidate's ties to the constituency. It lacks specific dates, detailed political experience, endorsements, and quotes.
